summary: Multi-game arcade with WASD and arrow key controls
architectural_notes: All games support both WASD and arrow key controls simultaneously for player movement

existing_features.title: Update SnakeGame to accept both WASD keys (W=up, A=left, S=down, D=right) and arrow keys for directional movement, allowing both control schemes to work simultaneously
Update BreakoutGame to accept both WASD keys (A=left, D=right) and arrow keys (ArrowLeft, ArrowRight) for paddle movement, allowing both control schemes to work simultaneously
Update the GameControlsOverlay component to display both WASD and arrow key controls for each game in the controls dialog

new_feature_requests.summary: Add WASD and arrow key controls to all games for movement
Update PongGame to accept both WASD keys (W=up, S=down) and arrow keys (ArrowUp, ArrowDown) for paddle movement, allowing both control schemes to work simultaneously

projectName: Add WASD and arrow key controls to all games
